ygData.subject: Re: Bug - EmptyStackException when job is submitted via JMX
ygData.msgSnippet: I have run into this.  Did you create your own XML file for submitting jobs?  Did you add anything (new nodes) to the document?  Does the document have any xml

I have run into this.  Did you create your own XML file for submitting jobs=
?  Did you add 
anything (new nodes) to the document?  Does the document ha=
ve any xml data within  the 
description?

Perhaps you could post the order=
 file so we can look.

Does your heritrix_out.log file contain any clues?

=
